Regulation Name(s): Multi-Target Respiratory Specimen Nucleic Acid Test Including SARS-CoV-2 and Other Microbial Agents
Specimen Container(s): Copan UTM 3C057N (Flexible Minitip Flocked Swab with UTM Medium)
Copan eNAT Molecular Collection and Preservation Medium P/N 6U074S01
Becton Dickinson Universal Viral Transport Kit P/N 220531
Copan UTM 3C064N (Regular Flocked Swab with UTM Medium)
Copan eNAT Molecular Collection and Preservation Medium P/N 6U073S01
Viral transport medium (Copan P/N 330C, 3C047N, BD Universal Transport Medium, Remel M4RT, Remel M5)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR)
Automated nucleic acid extraction and detection
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Xpert Xpress CoV-2/Flu/RSV plus multiplex RT-PCR test for detection and differentiation of SARS-CoV-2, influenza A, influenza B, and RSV RNA in respiratory specimens using the GeneXpert platform
Indications for Use Summary: Simultaneous in vitro qualitative detection and differentiation of SARS-CoV-2, influenza A, influenza B, and RSV RNA in nasopharyngeal and anterior nasal swab specimens from individuals with signs and symptoms of respiratory tract infection, aiding in diagnosis when used with other clinical and epidemiological information
